ArrayOfRelatedEntries.description: A list of written or spoken words

domains.description: A subject, discipline, or branch of knowledge particular to the Sense

language.description: IANA language code specifying the language of the word

regions.description: A particular area in which the pronunciation occurs, e.g. 'Great Britain'

registers.description: A level of language usage, typically with respect to formality. e.g. 'offensive', 'informal'

CategorizedTextList.description: various types of notes that appear

type.description: The descriptive category of the text

CrossReferencesList.description: A reference to another word that is closely related, might provide additional information about the subject, has a variant spelling or is an abbreviated form of it.

type.description: The type of relation between the two words. Possible values are 'close match', 'related', 'see also', 'variant spelling', and 'abbreviation' in case of crossreferences, or 'pre', 'post' in case of collocates.

etymologies.description: The origin of the word and the way in which its meaning has changed throughout history

homographNumber.description: Identifies the homograph grouping. The last two digits identify different entries of the same homograph. The first one/two digits identify the homograph number.

variantForms.description: Various words that are used interchangeably depending on the context, e.g 'a' and 'an'

ExamplesList.description: A list of written or spoken rendering of examples of use of a word or text

definitions.description: A list of statements of the exact meaning of a word

domains.description: A subject, discipline, or branch of knowledge particular to the Sense

regions.description: A particular area in which the pronunciation occurs, e.g. 'Great Britain'

registers.description: A level of language usage, typically with respect to formality. e.g. 'offensive', 'informal'

senseIds.description: The list of sense identifiers related to the example. Provided in the sentences endpoint only.

results.description: A mapping of filters available per endpoints.

entries.description: A list of filters available for Retrieve Entry endpoint

inflections.description: A list of filters available for LEMMATRON endpoint

translations.description: A list of filters available for Translations endpoint

wordlist.description: A list of filters available for Translations endpoint

GrammaticalFeaturesList.description: The different forms are correlated with meanings or functions which we text as 'features'

lexicalEntries.description: A grouping of various senses in a specific language, and a lexical category that relates to a word

type.description: The json object type. Could be 'headword', 'inflection' or 'phrase'

word.description: A given written or spoken realisation of a an entry, lowercased.

HeadwordLemmatron.description: Description of an inflected form of a word

InflectionsList.description: A grouping of the modifications of a word to express different grammatical categories

results.description: A list of inflections matching a given word

LemmatronLexicalEntry.description: Description of an entry for a particular part of speech and grammatical features

inflectionOf.description: The canonical form of words for which the entry is an inflection

lexicalCategory.description: A linguistic category of words (or more precisely lexical items), generally defined by the syntactic or morphological behaviour of the lexical item in question, such as noun or verb

text.description: A given written or spoken realisation of a an entry.

PronunciationsList.description: A list of possible pronunciations of a word

audioFile.description: The URL of the sound file

dialects.description: A local or regional variation where the pronunciation occurs, e.g. 'British English'

phoneticNotation.description: The alphabetic system used to display the phonetic spelling

phoneticSpelling.description: Phonetic spelling is the representation of vocal sounds which express pronunciations of words. It is a system of spelling in which each letter represents invariably the same spoken sound

regions.description: A particular area in which the pronunciation occurs, e.g. 'Great Britain'

additionalProperties.description: A list of lables for region.

results.description: A list of entries and all the data related to them

Sense.description: A lexical sense represents the lexical meaning of a lexical entry when interpreted as referring to the corresponding ontology element

id.description: The id of the sense that is required for the delete procedure

registers.description: A level of language usage, typically with respect to formality. e.g. 'offensive', 'informal'

actions.title: domains.source_language.get
actions.description: Returns a list of the available [domains](/glossary?tag=#domains&expand) for a given monolingual language dataset.

actions.title: domains.source_language.target_language.get
actions.description: Returns a list of the available [domains](/glossary?tag=#domains&expand) for a given bilingual language dataset.

actions.title: entries.source_language.word_id.sentences.get
actions.description: Retrieve list of sentences and list of [senses](/glossary?tag=#sense&expand) (English language only).

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.get
actions.description: Retrieve available [dictionary entries](/glossary?tag=#entry&expand) for a given word and language.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.antonyms.get
actions.description: Retrieve available [antonyms](/glossary?tag=#thesaurus&expand) for a given word and language.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.definitions.get
actions.description: Find available [dictionary entries](/glossary?tag=#entry&expand) for given word and language. Filter results by categories.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.examples.get
actions.description: Find available [dictionary entries](/glossary?tag=#entry&expand) for given word and language. Filter results by categories.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.pronunciations.get
actions.description: Find available [dictionary entries](/glossary?tag=#entry&expand) for given word and language. Filter results by categories.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.regions_region.get
actions.description: Retrieve available [dictionary entries](/glossary?tag=#entry&expand) for given word and language.

region.description: Region filter parameter. gb = Great Britain English. us = United States English. Default is gb.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.synonyms.get
actions.description: Retrieve available [synonyms](/glossary?tag=#thesaurus&expand) for a given word and language.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.synonyms_antonyms.get
actions.description: Retrieve available [synonyms and antonyms](/glossary?tag=#thesaurus&expand) for a given word and language.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.translations_target_lang.get
actions.description: Returns target language translations for a given word ID and source language. In the event that a word in the dataset does not have a direct translation, the response will be a [definition](/glossary?tag=#entry&expand) in the target language.

actions.title: entries.source_lang.word_id.filters.get
actions.description: Find available [dictionary entries](/glossary?tag=#entry&expand) for given word and language. Filter results by categories.

filters.description: Separate filtering conditions using a semicolon. Conditions take values grammaticalFeatures and/or lexicalCategory and are case-sensitive. To list multiple values in single condition divide them with comma.

actions.title: filters.get
actions.description: Returns a list of all the valid filters to construct API calls.

actions.title: filters.endpoint.get
actions.description: Returns a list of all the valid filters for a given endpoint to construct API calls.

actions.title: grammaticalFeatures.source_language.get
actions.description: Returns a list of the available [grammatical features](/glossary?tag=#grammaticalfeatures&expand) for a given language dataset.

actions.title: inflections.source_lang.word_id.get
actions.description: Retrieve available [lemmas](/glossary?tag=#lemma&expand) for a given [inflected](/glossary?tag=#inflection&expand) wordform.

actions.title: inflections.source_lang.word_id.filters.get
actions.description: Retrieve available [lemmas](/glossary?tag=#lemma&expand) for a given [inflected](/glossary?tag=#inflection&expand) wordform. Filter results by categories.

filters.description: Separate filtering conditions using a semicolon. Conditions take values grammaticalFeatures and/or lexicalCategory and are case-sensitive. To list multiple values in single condition divide them with comma.

actions.title: languages.get
actions.description: Returns a list of monolingual and bilingual language datasets available in the API

sourceLanguage.description: IANA language code. If provided output will be filtered by sourceLanguage.

targetLanguage.description: IANA language code. If provided output will be filtered by sourceLanguage.

actions.title: lexicalcategories.language.get
actions.description: Returns a list of available [lexical categories](/glossary?tag=#lexicalcategory&expand) for a given language dataset.

actions.title: regions.source_language.get
actions.description: Returns a list of the available [regions](/glossary?tag=#regions&expand) for a given monolingual language dataset.

actions.title: registers.source_language.get
actions.description: Returns a list of the available [registers](/glossary?tag=#registers&expand) for a given monolingual language dataset.

actions.title: registers.source_language.target_language.get
actions.description: Returns a list of the available [registers](/glossary?tag=#registers&expand) for a given bilingual language dataset.

actions.title: search.source_lang.get
actions.description: Retrieve available results for a search query and language.

prefix.description: Set prefix to true if you'd like to get results only starting with search string.

regions.description: Filter words with specific region(s) E.g., regions=us. For now gb, us are available for en language.

limit.description: Limit the number of results per response. Default and maximum limit is 5000.

offset.description: Offset the start number of the result.

actions.title: search.source_lang.translations_target_lang.get
actions.description: Find available translation results for a search query and language.

prefix.description: Set prefix to true if you'd like to get results only starting with search string.

regions.description: Filter words with specific region(s) E.g., regions=us. For now gb, us are available for en language.

limit.description: Limit the number of results per response. Default and maximum limit is 5000.

offset.description: Offset the start number of the result.

actions.title: wordlist.source_lang.filters_advanced.get
actions.description: Advanced options for retrieving [wordlist](/glossary?tag=#wordlist&expand) - exclude filter, filter by word length or match by substring (prefix).

filters_advanced.description: Semicolon separated list of wordlist parameters, presented as value pairs: LexicalCategory, domains, regions, registers. Parameters can take comma separated list of values. E.g., lexicalCategory=noun,adjective;domains=sport. Number of values limited to 5.

exclude.description: Semicolon separated list of parameters-value pairs (same as filters). Excludes headwords that have any senses in specified exclusion attributes (lexical categories, domains, etc.) from results.

exclude_senses.description: Semicolon separated list of parameters-value pairs (same as filters). Excludes those senses of a particular headword that match specified exclusion attributes (lexical categories, domains, etc.) from results but includes the headword if it has other permitted senses.

exclude_prime_senses.description: Semicolon separated list of parameters-value pairs (same as filters). Excludes a headword only if the primary sense matches the specified exclusion attributes (registers, domains only).

word_length.description: Parameter to speficy the minimum (>), exact or maximum (<) length of the words required. E.g., >5 - more than 5 chars; <4 - less than 4 chars; >5<10 - from 5 to 10 chars; 3 - exactly 3 chars.

prefix.description: Filter words that start with prefix parameter

exact.description: If exact=true wordlist returns a list of entries that exactly matches the search string. Otherwise wordlist lists entries that start with prefix string.

limit.description: Limit the number of results per response. Default and maximum limit is 5000.

offset.description: Offset the start number of the result.

actions.title: wordlist.source_lang.filters_basic.get
actions.description: Retrieve list of words for particular [domain](/glossary?tag=#domain&expand), [lexical category](/glossary?tag=#lexicalcategory&expand), [register](/glossary?tag=#register&expand) and/or [region](/glossary?tag=#region&expand).

filters_basic.description: Semicolon separated list of wordlist parameters, presented as value pairs: LexicalCategory, domains, regions, registers. Parameters can take comma separated list of values. E.g., lexicalCategory=noun,adjective;domains=sport. Number of values limited to 5.

limit.description: Limit the number of results per response. Default and maximum limit is 5000.

offset.description: Offset the start number of the result.
